original_text: Jesus saw that the crowd of people was quickly becoming bigger. So he told the bad spirit to stop. Jesus said to it, ‘Spirit, I am telling you that you must leave this boy. He cannot hear or speak because of you. I tell you to come out of him! You must never go into him again.’
korean_text: 예수께서 무리가 달려와 모이는 것을 보시고 그 더러운 귀신을 꾸짖어 이르시되 말 못하고 못 듣는 귀신아 내가 네게 명하노니 그 아이에게서 나오고 다시 들어가지 말라 하시매

sentences.original_text: Jesus saw that the crowd of people was quickly becoming bigger.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 무리가 빠르게 커지는 것을 보셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: So he told the bad spirit to stop.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 악한 영에게 그만두라고 명령했습니다.

sentences.original_text: that you must leave this boy.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이 소년에게서 떠나야 한다는 것이다.'

sentences.original_text: He cannot hear or speak because of you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너 때문에 듣거나 말할 수 없다.

sentences.original_text: I tell you to come out of him!
You must never go into him again.'
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 다시는 그에게 들어가면 안 된다.'
